title: Was constantly being kicked from LoL, ps4 acc hacked too.. fml
body:
Hey guys, don't know if its usual but, for like the past 5-6hrs i kept getting the error that an unauthorized computer was logging into my account. 
I changed my name, because my name and login were so close alike. 
Does Riot Games usually respond well to helping players in this situation? I havent played ranked in a while, been moving around alot recently (touring) 
and this just completly kills the vibe.

I also cant understand why, if i cant remember a detail like in which order my refund purchases were, that Riot says "your answer is invalid" 


What should i do? 
Semi freaking out atm.
